story_arceus_04_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
And I must say, your strength and talent are
just as impressive as his!
story_arceus_04_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
With those skills, you might even outmatch
Alder!
story_arceus_04_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
That said, strength can manifest in different
ways.
story_arceus_04_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Currently, of all the Trainers here on Pasio
who are or were formerly Champions, Alder
has the most experience.
story_arceus_04_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
His strength comes from that experience. It’s
not something that can be easily measured
or compared to younger Trainers like us.
story_arceus_04_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You might come out ahead in a contest of
brute strength, but in a battle—
story_arceus_04_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: I don’t really get all that complicated stuff!
